p: The lower values found in the Congo red method may be related to the fact that triple helical structure of β-glucans can be detected with this method [ 4, 9, 29]. It is known that mushroom β-glucans can have various conformations [ 10], which may not be detected using Congo red. On the other hand, the extraction method might not extract all triple helical β-glucans. Moreover β-glucans can adopt triple helical chain conformation in water solutions and form other structures in polar solutions for example [ 10].
